sqlMap.statement: SELECT ARRI.AR_LOCK_BOX_FILE_NM FROM AR_RCPT_RCV_INTFC ARRI WHERE ARRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ARRI.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ARRI.AR_LOCK_BOX_STS_CD = #arLockBoxStsCd# AND ARRI.AR_RCPT_RCV_WRK_CRAT_FLG != #arRcptRcvWrkCratFlg# AND ARRI.LOCK_BOX_NTFY_STS_CD != #lockBoxntfyStsCd# GROUP BY ARRI.AR_LOCK_BOX_FILE_NM

SELECT ARRI.AR_RCPT_RCV_INTFC_PK FROM AR_RCPT_RCV_INTFC ARRI WHERE ARRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ARRI.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ARRI.AR_LOCK_BOX_STS_CD <> #arLockBoxStsCd# AND ARRI.AR_LOCK_BOX_FILE_NM = #arLockBoxFileNm# AND ARRI.AR_RCPT_RCV_WRK_CRAT_FLG != #arRcptRcvWrkCratFlg# AND ARRI.LOCK_BOX_NTFY_STS_CD != #lockBoxntfyStsCd#
